summary: A small, detailed, atmospheric hideout off the beaten path between Riverwood and Whiterun. If you don't mind getting your boots wet, the sound of waterfalls, and prefer a darker hidden place to kick up your feet and drop off your loot...this may be the home for you.
descriptionHtml:
[img]http://i.imgur.com/yFk7FHh.jpg[/img]

THANKS to all who have provided feedback, endorsed, kudo'd, screenshoted and put the hideout as a File of the Month in May 2012.

[img]http://i.imgur.com/yszHp76.jpg[/img]

A small, detailed, atmospheric hideout off the beaten path between Riverwood and Whiterun. If you don't mind getting your boots wet, the sound of waterfalls, and prefer a darker hidden place to kick up your feet and drop off your loot...this may be the home for you.

Should be lore friendly, ready for companions, full crafting and storage.
[list][*]If anyone is familiar with my other mod [url=http://fallout3.nexusmods.com/mods/6394]Fallout 3 Mini Hideout.[/url] you may see some similarities, especially in style.
[*]The hideout is very lighting specific so ENB mods or other lighting effects may make it too dark or flicker more.
[/list]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/x8aUPS3.jpg[/img]

Thanks to DARKFIREGAMING, GamerPoets, BringYourMods, Brodual, Bits & Bobs and Gamespot for creating or reviewing great videos of the hideout:
[youtube]qA1fmS3ngGY[/youtube] [youtube]XpDtN7uwLuU[/youtube]

[youtube]dwhmS5Vr-pI[/youtube] [youtube]KxaMnoQN33E[/youtube]

[youtube]KF334TA1RcU[/youtube] [youtube]_Snj558OVuw[/youtube]

[img]http://i.imgur.com/9RBHTcp.jpg[/img]
[list][*]Forge
[*]Armor Workbench
[*]Grindstone
[*]Ore Smelter
[*]Enchanting Table
[*]Alchemy Table
[*]Tanning Rack
[*]Bed with Rested Bonus (3 sit markers on bed as well)
[*]Labeled Storage (safe, no respawn)
[*]Navmeshed with Idle Markers
[*]3 Weapon Plaque Displays
[*]2 Shield/Sword Plaque Displays
[*]5 Weapon Racks
[*]Mannequin
[*]Rayek's Blade (Nightingale clone w/ frost dmg)
[*]Custom Bookcases (148 books)
[*]Bath (seats 5)
[*]Cooking Pot
[*]Hidden Waterfall Entrance
[*]Map Marker (fast travel)
[*]Chopping Block and Wood Storage
[*]Talos Shrine that cures disease
[*]Unlimited Bookshelves compatible (make sure load order is correct)
[/list]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/clwhRZt.jpg[/img]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/20752]Spanish[/url] by ShironaMKRU
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=16108]German[/url] by Powerbenny1706
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=16371]Italian[/url] by Rilissimo
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/18092]French[/url] by Amylar
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/25788]Russian[/url] by Aelita

[img]http://i.imgur.com/oWCKgLe.jpg[/img][list][*]COMPATIBLE with [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=14308] Riverside Lodge[/url]
[*]Far left weapon rack at forge next to workbench will not let you pick up some weapons after you place it
[*]Reports of incompatiblity with Dwemer Armory
[*]Interferes with Scenic Carriages path between Riverwood and Whiterun
[*]Causes discoloration on Falkreath Water for some
[/list]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/IFRdYIc.jpg[/img]

Thanks to the following for their resources that helped create this mod:

[b]OpticShooter
[/b]Use of his Ocean.dds file from his [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=13268&navtag=file/images.php?id=13268&tab=3]W.A.T.E.R[/url] mod.

[b]Blary
[/b]For use of his resources at the following locations:[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=14134]
Open Books Resource[/url][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=14133&navtag=file/images.php?id=14133&tab=3]
Food Containers Resource[/url][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=14135]
Book Sets Resource
[/url]
Bethesda - Thanks for a great game.

[b]Nexus site/staff[/b] - Thank you for making a great place to share our creativity.

[size=4]The new expanded edition has been uploaded to SSE Nexus and can be found here:

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrimspecialedition/mods/8285/?][img]http://i.imgur.com/ws9Q9cC.jpg[/img][/url][/size]
author: Rayek
